usefulItems: freezable containers (e.g. aluminum, silicone), cling wrap, freezer, refrigerator
title: Chocolate Ice Cream

ingredients.content: 3 ½ oz dark chocolate, 70% cocoa, cut into pieces

preparations.content: Place dark chocolate into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 8<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Add cocoa powder, milk, whipping cream, sugar, egg yolks and salt and cook <b>8 min/195°F/speed 2<b>. Pour mixture up to 1½ inches high into shallow freezable containers and cover with cling wrap. Allow mixture to cool completely before freezing for at least 10 hours.

Place frozen mixture into refrigerator for 15 minutes, then cut into pieces (1½ in. x 1½ in.) with a sharp knife. Place half the pieces into mixing bowl and crush <b>20 sec/speed 6<b>, then mix with aid of spatula <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer ice cream into a bowl.
Place remaining frozen cream pieces into mixing bowl and crush <b>20 sec/speed 6<b>, then mix with aid of spatula <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer into bowl with ice cream and serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: For a firmer consistency place ice cream in freezer for <b>15 minutes<b> before serving.
Garnish with chopped pistachios, coconut flakes or chocolate chips.
Top with whipped cream and chocolate or fruit sauce.
For a spicy chocolate ice cream add some cayenne powder while chopping dark chocolate.
